Changelog
=========

1.1 (2011-12-06)
----------------

- Prevent the default value to be set during indexing, to prevent breaking
  ZCatalog internal structures.
  [mj]

.. important::
   You'll need to run http://url.to.your/plone-site/@@cleanup-catalog-ghosts
   to repair a broken ZCatalog after upgrade.

1.0 (2011-08-09)
----------------

- Initial release
  [ggozad]
